name: 電影史導論
goals: Offer an introduction to world cinema history, from the medium`s beginnings through the mid-late 20th century
Introduce students to technological aspects of film creation
syllabus:
Barsam, Richard and Dave Monahan. Looking at Movies: An Introduction to Film, 5th edition. Available at Bookman Books

GRADING will be based on attendance and preparation (10%), midterm writing assignment (25%), group presentation (20%), final writing assignment (25%), and short response papers (4x 5%) 20%.

grading.note: Requirements: 1. Regular attendance at and active participation in all classes; 2. Careful preparation of assigned materials, including screenings outside of class;  3. Weekly film journals; 4. Presentation on a film topic of student`s choice; 5. Evaluation:  Attendance and participation (10%) Take-home midterm exam (30%) In-class presentation on a film topic and its write-up (20%) Weekly Film Journal (10 %) Take-home final exam (30%)

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
